thread.section_title: Avis marchands de Lodgis | Avis - Lodgis | www.lodgis.com
thread.title: Dhiraj Kumar Hazra
thread.title_full: Lodgis évalué par Dhiraj Kumar Hazra

author: Dhiraj Kumar Hazra
title: Dhiraj Kumar Hazra
text: We have rented 2 apartments through Lodgis in Paris and the service they provided is excellent. For the first one I would like to thank MMe. Anna Ponceblanc and for the second one I am grateful to MMe Marianna Le Corre. In a difficult situation she was able to help us renting the right apartment very efficiently. We are extremely happy with their service. While lots of landlords asks for guarantor, a huge amount of agency fees without respecting the rules, lodgis was able to help us in a hassle free way.
